fields.name: All_Polygons_Mean_EVI
fields.description: Mean EVI over all spatial samples in farm area, after masking.

fields.name: Buffer_Mean_EVI
fields.description: Mean EVI over all spatial samples buffer area, after masking.

fields.name: %_Polygons_Over_Buffer_Mean
fields.description: Averge percent increase of farm mean EVI over buffer EVI.

fields.name: %_Farm_Above_Buffer_Mean
fields.description: Percent of polygons (given by number not field area) that are above the buffer mean EVI.

fields.name: Assessment
fields.description: Categorize vegetation health into one of four categories based on whitepaper.
